comment: The food is absolutely great but the facility itself is quite filthy and needs deep cleaning.
The wait staff was awesome despite the building being very hot and the beans being dry.
Do not let the exterior fool you because the service is great and food is amazing.
Fantastic chicken fried chicken and they were very cautious with my food allergies which I appreciate.
Great food and prices with friendly service that left both my husband and me happy today.
The service here is very pleasant and the food quality is good for the affordable price.
Really good chicken fried steak and great service in a very authentic down home Texas setting.
This location has the best chicken fried steak in Texas and the prices are always great.
Delicious food that is not overpriced and the waitresses were friendly to our large group daily.
The food is good but they really need to take pride and clean up the front.
Small hole in the wall diner with limited seating but the chicken fried steak was awesome.
A great mom and pop restaurant where the southern style fish and onion rings were excellent.
Even with the air conditioner out the food was great and the service was absolutely awesome.
I had an amazing fajita salad and my husband really enjoyed his delicious cheese burger here.
The Merkel location was very clean with great service and the chicken fried steak was bargain.
They ran out of ribeyes and the food was bland while the waitress was quite aggressive.
The staff was very sweet and the food was amazing with a surprising fried biscuit treat.
The food and setting are fantastic although the waitress was not very attentive to our table.
Food and service are always great and this specific Skeet's in Merkel is simply the best.
All the food tastes the same and sides are small considering the prices they are charging.
Great food and service and I highly recommend the Santa Fe burger with homemade onion rings.
The Mexican ribeye was perfect and very tender so I highly recommend trying this specific meal.
The food is decent but needs more seasoning and the staff can be a bit loud.
The El Paso burger is one of the best burgers ever and their chicken fried steak.
The chicken fried steak was amazing but the puffs are absolutely divine and a must try.
I was surprised by the food quality and the quesadilla was the best I have had.
You have got to get the fries and the combo salad with homemade ranch was great.
Excellent food and service with a smile and the hamburger steak was perfectly cooked home food.
